app.animation

Class AnimationMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.animation.AnimationMenu

  • public class AnimationMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles various animations for the main menu, such as title scaling, button hover effects, and menu transition animations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnimationMenu() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Applies animations to the menu title and buttons.

      Applies a hover effect to menu nodes by adjusting their fade animation.
      void startMenuAnimation(javafx.scene.layout.VBox centerPane, javafx.scene.Node[] nodes, javafx.scene.control.Label title)
      Applies an animated sequence to the main menu, including title fade-in, movement, and button animations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimationMenu

        public AnimationMenu()

    • Method Detail

      • menuAnimation

        public void menuAnimation(javafx.scene.control.Label title,
                          javafx.scene.control.Label[] buttons)
        Applies animations to the menu title and buttons. The title scales up and down continuously, and buttons fade in and out on hover.
        Parameters:
        title - The menu title label to animate.
        buttons - An array of button labels that will have hover effects.

      • startMenuAnimation

        public void startMenuAnimation(javafx.scene.layout.VBox centerPane,
                               javafx.scene.Node[] nodes,
                               javafx.scene.control.Label title)
        Applies an animated sequence to the main menu, including title fade-in, movement, and button animations. The animation consists of: - A pause before animations begin. - A fade-in effect for the title. - A translation effect that moves the title upward. - A fade-in effect for menu buttons. - A continuous scaling effect for the title.
        Parameters:
        centerPane - The VBox containing the menu elements.
        nodes - The menu buttons and interactive elements to animate.
        title - The menu title label to animate.

      • menuHover

        public void menuHover(javafx.scene.Node[] nodes)
        Applies a hover effect to menu nodes by adjusting their fade animation. If a node is an HBox, the effect is applied to all its child nodes as well.
        Parameters:
        nodes - The array of menu elements to apply the hover effect to.
